title: Bill Don't Lie - Joe House and Sean Grande
description: Bill's buddy Joe House comes on to break down Round 1 of the NBA playoffs. And the voice of the Boston Celtics, Sean Grande, looks at the matchup with the Cavs.
itunes:title: Bill Don't Lie - Joe House and Sean Grande
itunes:author: ESPN
